D

Database - Enum in deltadak
Class to communicate with database, it is an enum by the singleton design pattern.
Database() - Constructor for enum deltadak.Database
 
databasePath - Variable in enum deltadak.Database
 
dataFormat - Variable in class deltadak.Controller
 
dayBackward() - Method in class deltadak.Controller
called by the backward button moves the planner a (few) day(s) back
dayForward() - Method in class deltadak.Controller
called by the forward button moves the planner a (few) day(s) forward
deleteEmptyTasks() - Method in enum deltadak.Database
deletes all the homeworkTasks from the database where field homeworkTask is empty used when updating a day of which an item has been removed (by dragging)
deleteTable(String) - Method in enum deltadak.Database
Delete a given table from the database.
deleteTask(int) - Method in enum deltadak.Database
Delete a homeworkTask from the database given its id
deleteTasksDay(LocalDate) - Method in enum deltadak.Database
Deletes all homeworkTasks from the database for a given day.
